html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-01402023-02-14FIN
ActSpecial Import Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Import Measures Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL IMPORT MEASURES REGULATIONS (SIMR) in order to add Russia and Belarus to section 17.1 of SIMR, which specifies the countries with which the Canada Border Services Agency would require a reduced burden of proof to use a non-market economy methodology for the purpose of calculating margins of dumping.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0026 Publication Date: 2023-03-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Import Measures Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL IMPORT MEASURES REGULATIONS (SIMR) in order to add Russia and Belarus to section 17.1 of SIMR, which specifies the countries with which the Canada Border Services Agency would require a reduced burden of proof to use a non-market economy methodology for the purpose of calculating margins of dumping.
